title: holy TIT how has katarina not been gutted into the ground yet??

replies.body: obvious troll bait thread is obvious troll bait
obvious low elo is low elo

pffft

TIL a D4 is more pitiful than a B4.
Wow, standards have fallen.
bronze 4 mains op freelo like illaoi but can't climb ??

> > calling illaoi op freelo

pfffffffffffffffffft.
standards have really fallen.
\> not realizing illaoi is op freelo
troll harder kid
Katarina is not OP

Which assassin is weaker than her right now?

Playing a squishy without CC or wasting your CC for something pointless is how you sucessfully lose a lane against her.

And unless she's fed (by either free  farm or kills) she is garbage tier.

> [{quoted}](name=MadKnife IV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j2EJHKid,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-06T15:38:13.219+0000)
>
> Which assassin is weaker than her right now?
> 

1. {{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:45}}  {{champion:35}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:92}}

Riven, Pantheon, and Veigar aren't assassins...

Oh wait. 

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/583/040/cff.png
Hes kinda right about the others tho if were just talking about mid laners.
Except we're talking about assassins. Not just midlaners.
Well shes still stronger than pretty much every other mid lane assassin.

If we're not counting Yasuo as an assassin, you are correct. 

However, she's currently number 21 out of midlane champions. Which is hardly concerning. 

I wouldn't ask for assassin buffs or nerfs now since the assassin update is coming in the next preseason.

Yeah assassins arent exactly good in general atm (even tho every single high win% mid laner is an immobile mage (or Yasuo) nowadays, which is kinda weird).
But if you look at overall performance, Kat is at number 6, all other assassins are somewhere between number ~20-40.
Care to give a link?  It's clear I'm not the best at navigating Champion GG.

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?roleSort=Middle&sortBy=general.overallPosition&order=ascend :D
Not sure how exactly they calculate that tho lol. 
What Ive noticed is that for some reason, even with a low win rate, GP is always way up there (http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.overallPosition&order=ascend&roleSort=Top ), even number 11 in mid lane.

And Zed is sitting at a near 50% ban rate. 

Jesus.
woah haha nice meme xd

> [{quoted}](name=King of Mongoose,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j2EJHKid,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-06T15:41:53.584+0000)
>
> 1. {{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:45}}  {{champion:35}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:92}}

Ummmmm Viegar and Pantheon I wouldn't classify as assassins. And Riven pretty well depends on the build. If it's full Ad/Arpen she is assassin. Any other build would be bruiser/diver.

On that note I think LeBlanc, Fizz, Zed, Khazix, and shaco are much stronger picks. The rest is agree with.

Akali, Eve and Riven I can agree with.

Zed is oppressive, Veigar's a mage (they burst people too), Fizz got a trollpole, Kassadin takes a dump on Kat.

Kha'Zix on an isolated targeted is a strong assassin.

Shaco is BS to play against (if you're the jungler). Panth dumpsters Kat, Rengar oneshots (nuff said), LB dumpsters Kat.

Akali will shit on kat lategame, fizz can dodge all her damage, kass destroys her lategame, kha is a skill matchup, eve is eve, zed can dodge all her damage, veigar isn't an assassin, shaco.. lmfao u actually use shaco as an argument. patheon isn't an assassin and can stop her damage with his W, rengar can light her up before she even thinks about fighting, LB will get her damage off quicker and escape faster, Riven isn't an assassin.

She is trash tier, unless you're someone who doesn't want to use common sense, then ig she's god tier.

Any Hard CC and shes done. Her early game is ass. I won't go into deep explanation because it should be common sense.

http://memecrunch.com/meme/9Z8I8/not-even-in-a-million-years/image.gif

I'm still trying to figure out how you think {{champion:55}} is overpowered. Especially considering that you are Diamond 4 right now...
Because I witness the op freelo that is Katarina
She's already been gutted to the ground. She's now just a pubstomper.

- Squishy
- No escapes once you go in unless you get your passive off
- No CC abilities
- Hard CC destroys her

\> implying you need cc or get countered by cc when you have an instant blink

GL touching any competent katarina with a skillshot
Katarina is getting full rework because of how weak and useless she it...
